mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MOVIE M LEFT OUTER JOIN MOVIE_RELEASE MR WHERE M.MOVIE_IDX = MR.MOVIE_IDX
SELECT * FROM MOVIE_SCHEDULE MS LEFT OUTER JOIN MOVIE_CINEMA MC ON MS.CINEMA_IDX = MC.CINEMA_IDX WHERE MS.MOVIE_IDX = #{MOVIE_IDX}

SELECT MS.*, MT.THEATER_NAME FROM MOVIE_SCHEDULE MS JOIN MOVIE_THEATER MT ON MS.THEATER_IDX = MT.THEATER_IDX WHERE DATE(MS.START_TIME) = #{DATE} AND MS.CINEMA_IDX = #{CINEMA_IDX} AND MS.MOVIE_IDX = #{MOVIE_IDX};
SELECT MS.*, COALESCE(MR.RESERVATION_STATUS, 'EMPTY') AS RESERVATION_STATUS FROM MOVIE_SEAT MS LEFT JOIN MOVIE_RESERVATION MR ON MS.SEAT_IDX = MR.SEAT_IDX AND MR.SCHEDULE_IDX = #{SCHEDULE_IDX};
